nodes.text: Sommen was an agent who worked for the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. As a part of a infiltration mission, Sommen worked as a medical engineer for Neuro-Saav Corporation on Tauber. He was design-station neighbor to Dr. Cinto Alaras. The Rebel Alliance Task Force feared that Alaras was trying to steal Sommen's work and would soon reveal his cover.
